title: How to Make Sweet Curry Powder

steps.headline: If using fresh spices, grind or mill them in readiness.
steps.description: Fresh spices will always have a superior taste over pre-ground varieties.

steps.headline: Mix the spices together in a small mixing bowl.
Pour into a suitable airtight container for storage.
steps.description: Use a funnel to assist so that you don't lose any.

steps.headline: Label and store.
steps.description: This curry mix will keep well for up to 6 months. Store in a cool, dry place.

tyn: Airtight storage container; a cleaned out herb jar is ideal.
Label and marker for dating and naming
text: If using fresh spices, grind or mill them in readiness. Fresh spices will always have a superior taste over pre-ground varieties. Mix the spices together in a small mixing bowl. Combine well. Pour into a suitable airtight container for storage. Use a funnel to assist so that you don't lose any. Label and store. This curry mix will keep well for up to 6 months. Store in a cool, dry place.
